mapper.select: select mem_nickname from member where mem_no=#{param1}
select mem_tel from member where mem_no=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into rehome(rh_no, rh_gb1, rh_gb2, rh_gb3, rh_title, rh_pname, rh_pno, rh_misdate, rh_misplace, rh_image, mem_no, mem_nickname, mem_tel, rh_content, rh_readcount) values (rh_no.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, #{param8}, #{param9}, 0, 0, 0, #{param10}, 0)
